{{also|familie}} ==German== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|de|la|familia}}, from {{m|la|famula||female servant}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/faˈmiːliə/}} * {{audio|de|De-Familie.OGG|audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Familien}} # [[family]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|n}} ====Compounds==== * {{l|de|Familienanschluß}} * {{l|de|familienfreundlich}} * {{l|de|Familiengericht}} * {{l|de|Familienname}} * {{l|de|Großfamilie}} * {{l|de|Kernfamilie}} * {{l|de|Kleinfamilie}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|familiär}} * {{l|de|Famulus}} ====Descendants==== * {{desc|bor=1|da|familie}} * {{desc|bor=1|dsb|familija}} * {{desc|bor=1|no|-}} {{l|nb|familie}} * {{desc|bor=1|ru|фамилия}} ===See also=== * taxonomy: [[Gattung]] --- [[Ordnung]] ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Taxonomy]] ---- ==Saterland Frisian== ===Etymology=== Compare {{cog|de|Familie}}; English {{m|en|family}}. ===Noun=== {{head|stq|noun|g=f}} # [[family]] ====Synonyms==== * {{l|stq|Früündskup}}
